channel.title: Beard problem
channel.description:
Watehfuh.
My guy on my server has an invisible chin if I choose to have no beard. How can I fix this bug, as it looks stupid and it's annoying.
Thank-you!
[br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2007, 07:44:44 PM[/size][hr]Hello, help me. Kthxbai.
